welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ilford, where the bustling streets and diverse culture make for an enchanting experience. Get ready to explore the town's rich history, beautiful parks, and vibrant shopping scene. Enjoy your visit!

restaurants.name: Nagina
restaurants.description: Nagina is a asian restaurant located in Ilford.
restaurants.address: 296-298 Ilford Ln, Ilford, Greater London, IG1 2LP

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: A satellite terminal at Stansted Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with limited access to streaming services.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: Southend Airport's main terminal is a modern and compact facility, offering a range of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Southend Airport is used for overflow and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.
